subject: Baseball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Jay Bruce hit a tie-breaking, three-run double in the ninth inning and the Cincinnati Reds beat the host Philadelphia Phillies, 6-3, Tuesday night to snap a six-game losing streak.
snippet: Jay Bruce hit a tie-breaking, three-run double in the ninth inning and the Cincinnati Reds beat the host Philadelphia Phillies, 6-3, Tuesday night to snap a six-game losing streak.
